arg.name: runtime_config_package
arg.description: Package with the controller's configuration in 'config' folder. Usually the argument is not set, it enables use of a custom setup.

arg.name: controllers_file
arg.description: YAML file (without extension) with the controllers configuration.

arg.name: description_package
arg.description: Description package with robot URDF/xacro files. Usually the argument is not set, it enables use of a custom description.

arg.name: description_file
arg.description: URDF/XACRO description file (without extension) with the robot.

arg.name: prefix
arg.description: Prefix of the joint names, useful for multi-robot setup. If changed than also joint names in the controllers' configuration have to be updated.

arg.name: use_mock_hardware
arg.description: Start robot with mock hardware mirroring command to its states.

arg.name: mock_sensor_commands
arg.description: Enable mock command interfaces for sensors used for simple simulations. Used only if 'use_mock_hardware' parameter is true.

arg.name: robot_controller
arg.description: Robot controller to start. Choices are: [forward_position_controller, joint_trajectory_controller].

arg.name: inactive_robot_controller
arg.description: Robot controller to start inactive. Choices are: [forward_position_controller, joint_trajectory_controller].
